mapper.select: SELECT KHJ_ID, KHJ_NAME, KHJ_DESCRIPTION, KHJ_USE_YN, KHJ_REG_USER FROM KHJ_BOARD WHERE KHJ_ID=#{id}

SELECT KHJ_ID, KHJ_NAME, KHJ_DESCRIPTION, KHJ_USE_YN, KHJ_REG_USER FROM KHJ_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND KHJ_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND KHJ_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY KHJ_ID DESC OFFSET #firstIndex# ROWS FETCH NEXT #recordCountPerPage# ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM KHJ_BOARD WHERE 1=1
AND KHJ_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND KHJ_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
